ygData.subject: RE: RE: something about slow vs. fast weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Honestly, Sylly, lately I ve found your posts almost impossible to read.  I ve even been deleting some of them unread.  I know some people find it faster to
ygData.messageBody:
Honestly, Sylly, lately I've found your posts almost impossible to
read. I've even been deleting some of them unread. I know some
people find it faster to type that way, but the time you save typing,
I spend trying to decipher what you meant. And, to me at least, its a
sign of someone who doesn't care how they're presenting themselves to
the rest of the list. In email (and Usenet, as this also holds there)
we can only judge you by the style of writing you use. And whether
you hold any intelligence or not, that style tends to make people
look less than intelligent. In any case, I'm not telling you to
*stop* using d00dtype, but I delete it if I can't decipher it.

I'm not bashing Sylly here; from previous posts, I do think he has a
clue. I just want to make sure that other people can *see* his clue.

--
Katy Westerman Don't lick something unless
katyw@... you really mean it.
http://www.cs.ucr.edu/~katyw -Advice from the Naked
CS/Comp Math Major, UC Riverside Dancing Llama
